original_text: I pray that God will be kind to you and that he will give you peace in your minds more and more. I want you to know more and more how much God loves you.
korean_text: 긍휼과 평강과 사랑이 너희에게 더욱 많을지어다

sentences.original_text: I pray that God will be kind to you
and that he will give you peace in your minds
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분께서 너희 마음에 평안을 주시기를

sentences.original_text: more and more how much God loves you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 너희를 얼마나 사랑하시는지를 점점 더 많이.
